top_visible_issues: No online booking system for a hospitality business with strong demand signals

outreach_hook: Arnos Bistrot has built a strong local reputation with a 4.9 Google rating across 293 reviews, and the website is a solid foundation to build on. Adding an online booking system and a regularly updated content section would improve conversion rates and help capture more of the search traffic your reputation is already generating.
